Golden Axe - The Duel

Emulator

FFS 0.10 Prototype

Tools

Saturn System Disk Black
Saturn Swap Guides

How to use the Emulator
First u have to install Daemon tools or something else
Then mount the game that you want to play with Daemon Tools
Now start SSF with Admin Rights on VISTAWINDOWS7
Then go to Option
Select the CD Drive for Daemon Tools it's FCNO TUN0UN0
If you have Games burned on Disk Choose the Drive where the Game Disk is 
Select the bios File for The Country where the Game is made for
Then select the Country
NOTE:
(It's very important for the most Games to select the right Bios and Region)

After that you can choose other option like sound graphics and controller settings
Now go to Hardware and select CD Close
If it don't work select Reset to Reboot the Emulator
and now the Game runs

Enjoy!
